author: hustla187
title: Castle, Town, Space and Pirates
review: This is a pretty good deal. You get four sets from four different themes. If you are a huge fan of any of these themes, you should get this somewhere, but if you don't want one of them, you might have to sell it separately.

author: AETerry
title: Value Pack Review
review:
This is one of many of LEGO's Value Packs that they have offered over the years to collectors. 4 different minisets, 1 each for Town, Castle, Pirates and Space.

 

Town - This is the one set that's a downer for me. I don't particularly like this race car, mainly it's model and lack of a number.

 

Castle - This looks like a small tower that features a ghost and minifigure. Both are good as I was looking to collect all the sets featuring ghosts and the minifigure isn't bad for an army builder though it's not certain or clear which army he'd go to.

 

Space - This is a Blacktron 2 set with a little space ship that's not bad for build and a Blacktron 2 minifigure.

 

Pirates - This isn't too bad... not when I was out to collect all the Pirate sets I could. There's a palm tree, a minifigure with a tricorne hat, chest of gold hidden in rocks and a monkey.

 

The Value Packs aren't bad if you're wanting a sampling of different themes and are a collector who wants to get them.
